title: Real-Time Chat App
description: A scalable real-time chat backend built with Node.js, Socket.IO, and MongoDB. Supports typing indicators, read receipts, and handles 200+ concurrent users with sub-150ms latency.

title: Job Data Automation System
description: High-performance scraping and data pipeline system capable of processing 20,000+ job listings with CAPTCHA handling and retry logic.

title: Shopify App Optimization
description: Performance engineering project achieving 70% faster load times (3.2s to <1s) via caching, asset optimization, and lazy loading strategies.
